articles.description: Follow match build-up, live text updates and radio from the Premier League featuring Aston Villa v Bournemouth and Manchester City v Southampton.
articles.title: Premier League LIVE: Build-up to Aston Villa vs Bournemouth & four other games

articles.description: Listen to Sportsound and follow live text commentary, score updates and match report from Aberdeen vs Dundee United in the Scottish Premiership.
articles.title: Aberdeen vs Dundee United: Scottish Premiership - BBC Sport

articles.description: Manchester City return to the top of the Premier League as Erling Haaland’s early effort proves enough to beat struggling Southampton.
articles.title: Man City 1-0 Southampton: Erling Haaland goal sends City top of Premier League

articles.description: Bryan Mbeumo scores a 96th minute winner as Brentford beat Ipswich in a seven-goal thriller at the Gtech Community Stadium.
articles.title: Mbeumo scores winner as Brentford beat Ipswich in thriller

articles.description: Bournemouth striker Evanilson scores with the last touch of the game to rescue a dramatic point at Aston Villa in the Premier League.
articles.title: Aston Villa 1-1 Bournemouth: Evanilson scores 96th-minute equaliser

articles.description: Captain Ben Stokes backs his batters after another collapse condemns England to series defeat in Pakistan.
articles.title: England in Pakistan: Ben Stokes backs struggling batters after series defeat

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Brighton & Hove Albion vs Wolverhampton Wanderers in the Premier League
articles.title: Brighton 2-2 Wolves: Wolves off bottom of Premier League after late comeback draw

articles.description: Borussia Dortmund lost 2-1 to struggling Augsburg as they fell further off the pace in the Bundesliga.
articles.title: Bundesliga: Dortmund lose to Augsburg as poor start continues

articles.description: Follow live text commentary from three lunchtime kick-offs as Bristol City take on Leeds United, Coventry City face Luton Town and Watford host Blackburn Rovers in the Championship, followed by seven other matches.
articles.title: EFL Championship LIVE: Scores & text commentaries from ten games

articles.description: Jonathan Agnew ends his time as BBC cricket correspondent reflecting on another England collapse as the tourists fall to a 2-1 series defeat in Pakistan.
articles.title: England in Pakistan: Jonathan Agnew on one last collapse from the tourists in his final Test as BBC cricket correspondent
